Chief Technology Officer Job at Greenwood Limited




        
    

        
        Greenwood limited is a human resource consulting firm whose objective is the help our clients optimize their business and workforce expertly. Our services include but not limited to Recruitment, Talent management, Performance management, anagement consultancy, Employee relations, Payroll and beneft packages, Training and development etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Chief Technology Officer

Job Location:  Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our Client is seeking an experienced and visionary Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to lead our technology organization and drive the company's strategic technology initiatives.
	The successful candidate will have a strong background in technology, a deep understanding of the financial services industry, and a proven track record of leading technology teams.


Key Responsibilities


	Technology Strategy: Develop and implement a comprehensive technology strategy that aligns with the company's business goals and objectives.
	Technology Leadership: Provide leadership and direction to the technology organization, including software development, infrastructure, cybersecurity, and data analytics.
	Innovation: Identify and leverage emerging technologies to drive innovation and competitiveness in the financial services industry.
	Cybersecurity: Ensure the security and integrity of the company's technology systems and data.
	Partner Management: Develop and maintain relationships with technology partners and vendors.
	Talent Management: Attract, retain, and develop top technology talent.


Requirements


	A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is required.
	Executive Experience: Proven experience as a CTO or in a similar executive role, with a track record of success in leading technology organizations.
	Technical Expertise: Strong technical expertise in areas such as software development, infrastructure, cybersecurity, and data analytics.
	Leadership Skills: Excellent leadership and management skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate technology teams.
	Business Acumen: Strong business acumen, with the ability to understand the financial services industry and drive business growth.


Nice to Have:


	Financial Services Experience: Experience working in the financial services industry, with knowledge of regulatory requirements and industry standards.
	Cloud Experience: Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure.
	Certifications: Relevant certifications such as Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) or Certified Technology Executive (CTE).


What We Offer


	Competitive Compensation: A competitive compensation package with opportunities for growth and development.
	Opportunities for Growth: Opportunities for career growth and professional development in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
	Collaborative Environment: A collaborative and dynamic work environment with a team of experienced professionals.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: greenwoodlimited.ng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: If you're a visionary technology leader looking for a new challenge, we'd love to hear from you!

title: Job Openings at Ellasot Consulting
content:
Ellasot Consulting is an organizational development and Human Resource Management advisory firm that provides expert advice and support to organizations to improve workforce performance and align strategies with objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Human Resource Executive

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Resumption: Immediately

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented HR Executive to support daily HR operations and ensure smooth implementation of HR policies, recruitment processes, and employee engagement initiatives.


Responsibilities


	Assist in recruitment and onboarding of new employees
	Maintain accurate employee records and HR documentation
	Support performance management and appraisal processes
	Handle employee relations and disciplinary documentation
	Ensure compliance with labour laws and company policies
	Assist in payroll processing and leave administration
	Coordinate training and development activities.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in HR, Business Administration, or related field
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in HR operations
	Good knowledge of Nigerian labour laws
	Strong organisational and communication skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook).


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: frontdeskellasot@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Executive Personal Assistant

Job Location: Trans Amadi, Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Resumption: Immediately

Job Summary


	We are seeking a smart, organized, and tech-savvy Executive Personal Assistant with strong social media management skills to provide high-level administrative support while managing the company’s online presence and brand image.


Duties / Responsibilities


	Prepare and edit correspondence, communications, presentations, and other documents for the MD.
	Ensure the MD is aware of and prepared for all scheduled commitments.
	Take detailed minutes during meetings and ensure follow-up on action items.
	Assist with special projects and initiatives as assigned.
	Develop, implement, and manage the company’s social media strategy.
	Create engaging multimedia content (text, image, video) suitable for different social media platforms.
	Collaborate with other departments to ensure content aligns with company goals and targets.
	Plan and execute social media campaigns to increase brand awareness, engagement, and traffic.
	Monitor and report on social media trends and competitors' activities.
	Develop strategies to grow the audience and improve engagement across all platforms.
	Analyze key metrics and adjust social media strategy as needed to improve performance.


Requirements / Skills


	BSc/HND in Business Administration, Mass Communication, or related discipline
	Minimum of 2 years of experience as a PA or in a similar role
	Proven experience managing social media accounts
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and social media tools
	Confidential and professional work ethic
	Knowledge of Canva or basic graphic design tools
	Experience with content scheduling tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer)
	Ability to write simple marketing captions and posts.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: frontdeskellasot@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) HR Administrator

Job Location: Trans Amadi, Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Resumption: Immediately

Job Summary


	We are hiring an organized and efficient HR Administrator to manage HR documentation, support staff welfare, and handle day-to-day administrative HR functions.


Duties / Responsibilities


	Maintain staff records and personnel files
	Process leave requests and track attendance
	Prepare HR documents such as offer letters and confirmations
	Assist with recruitment and onboarding
	Respond to employee inquiries on HR issues
	Support payroll input and benefit administration
	Ensure proper filing and document control organizational development


Requirements / Skills


	HND / BSc in HR, Business Admin, or related discipline
	Minimum of 1 year of experience in HR administration
	Good computer skills (Word, Excel)
	Strong attention to detail and confidentiality
	Ability to multitask.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: frontdeskellasot@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

4.) Human Resource Manager

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a strategic and people-focused HR Manager to lead the HR department, drive talent development, and ensure strong workforce planning and compliance.


Duties / Responsibilities


	Develop and implement HR policies and structure
	Lead recruitment, talent acquisition, and workforce planning
	Oversee payroll, performance management, and employee relations
	Ensure compliance with labour laws and internal policies
	Advise management on HR strategies and organizational development
	Drive employee engagement and training programs
	Handle conflict resolution and disciplinary matters


Requirements / Skills


	Bachelor’s degree in HR, Business Administration, or related field
	Minimum of 5 years of HR experience, including leadership role
	Professional HR certification (CIPM, SHRM, HRCI) is an advantage
	Sound knowledge of Nigerian labour laws
	Excellent leadership and communication skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: frontdeskellasot@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

In response to environmental concerns, we have installed solar panels to partially power the plant on solar energy also we have a state of the art effluent treatment plant to treat and reuse the water discharged during the various production processes.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistics Coordinator

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) , Enugu, Kano and Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking proactive and highly organized Logistics Coordinators to oversee and manage day-to-day logistics operations across our locations in Port Harcourt, Enugu, Abuja, and Kano.
	The ideal candidates will ensure the smooth flow of goods, timely delivery, efficient documentation, and effective communication with internal teams, vendors, and clients. Candidates must be able to resume on short notice.


Job Description
The Logistics Coordinator will be responsible for:


	Coordinating dispatch, delivery schedules, and distribution activities.
	Ensuring accurate documentation, record-keeping, and reporting of logistics operations.
	Tracking shipments and resolving delays or operational issues promptly.
	Liaising with suppliers, drivers, warehouse personnel, and clients to ensure seamless workflow.
	Monitoring inventory levels and supporting warehouse operations as required.
	Ensuring compliance with company policies, operational standards, and safety procedures.
	Providing timely updates to management on logistics performance and challenges.
	Supporting process improvements to optimize logistics efficiency.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree or HND in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
	2–3 years of relevant experience in logistics coordination or a similar role.
	Strong communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office and basic logistics/ERP software.
	Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks.
	Must be able to resume on short notice.


Salary
N100,000 monthly.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Accounting Officer

Employment Type: Full-time

	Coordinating accounting functions and programs.
	Preparing financial analyses and reports.
	Preparing revenue projections and forecasting expenditure.
	Assisting with preparing and monitoring budgets.

	Preparing federal, state, local, and special tax returns.
	Contributing to the development of new or amended accounting systems, programs, and procedures.
	Performing other accounting duties and supporting junior staff as required or assigned.

	Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or Finance required.

	Working knowledge of tax laws and ERPs.
	Adequate knowledge of Fund Administration/Management
	Financial Reporting Skills
	Strong financial analysis skills.
